data.name: Thymesia - Artbook
data.detailed_description:
Delve into the work of Thymesia and explore the art behind the punishing action-RPG. See the Kingdom of Hermes and how the characters came to life in the official Artbook for the game.

The Artwork included has been done by Noel Lin, GuanYu Chen and Pukun Wang
data.about_the_game:
Delve into the work of Thymesia and explore the art behind the punishing action-RPG. See the Kingdom of Hermes and how the characters came to life in the official Artbook for the game.

The Artwork included has been done by Noel Lin, GuanYu Chen and Pukun Wang
data.short_description: Delve into the work of Thymesia and explore the art behind the punishing action-RPG. See the Kingdom of Hermes and how the characters came to life in the official Artbook for the game.
data.supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian
